description: Application for Non-Material Amendment following planning permission ref: P2018/2749/FUL dated 1 August 2019. The amendments comprise alterations to the approved glazing to the northern elevation of the existing building including omission of two proposed windows and revised design of three approved windows, and alterations to the design of the glazing on the extension including reducing the number of opening doors from three to one.
decision_conditions:
Condition 2 attached to planning consent P2018/2749/FUL dated 1 August 2019 should now read as:
DRAWING AND DOCUMENT NUMBERS:  The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:
Location Plan 0103 RevB; Existing Basement Floor Plan 0110 RevB; Existing Ground Floor Plan 0111 RevB; Existing First Floor Plan 0112 RevB; Existing Front Elevation 0300 RevA; Existing Rear Elevation 0301 RevA; Existing Side Elevation 0302 RevA; Proposed Context Site Plan 0110 RevJ; Proposed Ground Floor Plan 0151 RevN; Proposed First Floor Plan 0152 RevJ; Proposed Second Floor Plan 0153 RevJ; Proposed East Elevation 0340 RevJ; Proposed North Elevation 0342 RevQ; Proposed West Elevation 0343 RevJ; Proposed South Elevation 0344 RevJ; Design and Access Statement; Letter from Metropolis ref: 2062/08-1807GC01 dated 10 August 2018;  Letter from Metropolis ref: 2062/08-19--12GC01ldl dated 02 December 2019
REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
